Key Match Events: Nikola Vucevic had 24 points and 11 rebounds
Zach LaVine scored 14 of his game-high 35 points in the fourth quarter and grabbed 10 rebounds
Chicago overcame a 19-point deficit in the third quarter
Chicago took its first lead of the night on Coby White’s driving layup with 47.1 seconds left in the fourth that made it 111-110
The Bulls ended the game on an 11-0 run
Chris Paul missed a desperation 3-pointer in the final second
Victor Wembanyama had 23 points and 14 rebounds
San Antonio went scoreless over the game’s final 3:52
Post-Match Reflections: Zach LaVine reached the 30-point plateau for the fourth time in five games
